readability_reflection: I found concatenation more readable as the symbols used are easy to understand especially for a newcomer.
comprehension_debugging: Using interpolation and concatenation helps me realize where specific bugs are in parts of my code with outputs.
preference_rationale: I would tend to prefer concatenation for now because of readability, but my opinion may change in the future.
learning_curve: My prior knowledge of concatenation helped, but I can't recall prior knowledge on interpolation so that could be why I prefer concatenation at the moment.
